name: BackWords Game
description:
BackWords Game is a fun and entertaining game of guessing words in reverse. Choose a word and send the recording to your friend. Your friend will hear your word played backwards and then mimic exactly what they hear. Their recording will then flip and play forwards allowing them to hear and guess your original word! You'll need a keen ear and quick tongue to be a master at this game.

You can play with distant friends using Game Center or free play passing the device between friends.

Good luck!
